name: Inaugural 2025 SakuraFest
description: A new annual celebration honoring the cultural and seasonal significance of sakura (cherry blossoms) in Canada. The inaugural festival invites guests of all ages to celebrate spring through Japanese heritage, tradition, and artistry. Set among the JCCCâ€™s own blooming sakura trees, SakuraFest 2025 will feature a vibrant lineup of events, including film screenings, live performances, hands-on workshops, culinary pop-ups, and family-friendly activities. Visitors are invited to step inside the Centre to continue their hanami (flower viewing) journey with immersive cultural experiences.

name: Sprint Studio - Legal Tech Pre-Acceletator
description: Are you an innovator, entrepreneur, professional, student or recent graduate building a solution for the legal tech industry? Learn how to successfully bring your solution to market with Sprint Studio, an intensive, eight-week online, pre-accelerator. Learn from industry experts, develop your customer base and build a market-ready legal tech solution.
